about_the_game:
Become the Ultimate Go-Kart Tycoon! 🚥🏁

Start your thrilling journey as the owner of a modest go-kart business and build your empire from the ground up! Buy your first kart, gear up with essential racing equipment, and open your track to eager customers. As your guests race around the track, you’ll earn cash to expand your business.

Key Features:

Run the Show: Purchase and upgrade facilities like garages, tracks, and even luxury shower cabins. Make your venue the go-to destination for thrill-seekers.

Expand Your Fleet: Add more go-karts to your collection and keep the cash flowing. From basic models to high-end machines, the choice is yours.

Repair & Customize: Maintain your vehicles in the garage and give them that extra edge. Make them faster, sleeker, and more luxurious to impress your customers.

Boost Your Brand: Get your name out there with billboards, posters, and massive sponsorship deals. The bigger your brand, the higher your profits.

Host Epic Events: Organize adrenaline-pumping tournaments with grand prizes. Fill your stands with cheering fans and turn your venue into a racing paradise.

Take the Wheel: When you need a break, hop into one of your go-karts and hit the track yourself. Feel the rush of the race and test out your latest upgrades.

Hire a Crew: Struggling to keep up with the demand? Bring in workers to handle repairs, customer service, and more, so you can focus on growing your empire.

Chase the Dream:

From local hero to industry titan, it’s up to you to transform your go-kart business into the ultimate racing destination. Will you dominate the competition and become a legend, or will the pressure of the track leave you in the dust? The race is on!

Buckle up and take control. Your empire awaits! 🏎💨

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 @ 3,3 GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 @ 3,2 GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
